title: giri vara puthrim
sahitya:
girivara putrIm sarasija nEtrIm kalayE vinata varAbhaya dAtrIm

anupallavi

 karivara mukha SaNmukha janayitrIm surucira campaka kOmala gAtrIm

caraNam

 shankha mukhAlaya niratAm lalitAm shakalita duritAm shyAmalAtItAm 
shankara dayitAm shAstra nigaditAm mangala vana tulasI varivasitAm
